summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account from October 1 to October 31, 2013. It details significant incoming transfers and the account's ending balance, highlighting financial activities related to large sums of money.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

persons.name: Leon D. Black
persons.context: Leon D. Black is noted as a recipient of a significant incoming money transfer to the account.

persons.name: Debra R. Black
persons.context: Debra R. Black is mentioned alongside Leon D. Black as a recipient of a large incoming transfer.

connections.description: Leon D. Black and Debra R. Black are connected as they are both listed as account holders receiving funds.

events.title: Incoming Money Transfer
events.description: A transfer of $12,755,048.50 was credited to the account.

events.title: Incoming Money Transfer
events.description: An incoming transfer of $8,500,000.00 was credited to the account.

events.title: Incoming Money Transfer
events.description: A transfer of $6,000,000.00 was credited to the account.

events.title: Interest Payment
events.description: An interest payment of $3,790.24 was credited to the account.

keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $27,258,838.74 on October 1, 2013.
Significant incoming transfers included $12,755,048.50, $8,500,000.00, and $6,000,000.00 during October 2013.
The account ended with a balance of $27,258,838.74 on October 31, 2013.
Amanda Kirby is the contact person for account inquiries.
Leon D. Black and Debra R. Black are associated with large financial transactions in this document.
